title: kOri vacchithinayya
sahitya:
kOri vaccitinayya gOpAAla shaurE vArijAkSa nannu vAncatOnu brOtuvani
anupallavi

nIraja nayana nEramulanniyu vArinci ika nAku varamu losaguduvani

caraNam

anayamu ninu bhajiyincina vArala Apadalellanu tolagintuvanucu vini 
nI sannidhi vEgamE goliciti sanaka vinuta gOpAla dAsanuta
